ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Aggāḷava Shrine.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six approached some silk-makers and said,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.3_0: “Boil many silkworms and give us silk.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.4_0: We wish to make blankets containing silk.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.6_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics approach us and say
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.8_0: It’s our misfortune that we must cause the death of many small creatures because of our livelihood and because of our wives and children.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.9_0: The monks heard those people complaining,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.10_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.11_0: “How can the monks from the group of six approach silk-makers and say
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.13_0: After criticizing those monks in many ways, they told the Buddha ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.14_0: “Is it true, monks, that you approached silk-makers and said,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.15_0: ‘Boil many silkworms and give us silk.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.16_0: We wish to make blankets containing silk’?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.19_0: “Foolish men, how can you approach silk-makers and say
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.21_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.22_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:1.23.1_0: ‘If a monk has a blanket made that contains silk, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.6_0: it is put out in charge of building work.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.8_0: If he makes a blanket that contains even one thread of silk, or he has one made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.9_0: When he gets the sitting-blanket, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.10_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.11_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.13_0: ‘Venerables, this blanket containing silk which I had made is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.14_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.1.17_0: ‘I give these tonics back to you.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.2_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.3_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.4_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.5_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.6_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.8_0: if she makes a canopy, a floor cover, a cloth screen, a mattress, or a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-np11:2.2.11_0: The first rule, the training rule on silk, is finished.
